section.title: Description
section.p: [US Standard Certificate Of Death Fields 38 - 44]. Information related to cases where the decedents death was due to injury or poisoning.

stentry.p: [US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 38]. The date and time that the injury or poisoning occurred that eventually lead to the decedent's death.
[US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 43]. A textual description of how the injury occurred .

[US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 40]. The general place (such as restaurant, vacant lot, or home) where the injury occurred. Company or organization names are not to be used. (For example, factory , not Standard Manufacturing, Inc. )
[US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 42]. The street address of the location at which the injury or poisoning occurred .

[US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 44]. If the injury was transportation related, this property categories whether the injury occurred while the decedent was a: Driver/Operator, Passenger, Pedestrian, or Other. Driver/operator and passenger should be designated for modes other than motor vehicles such as bicycles. Other applies to watercraft, aircraft, animal, or people attached to outside of vehicles (e.g. surfers).

[US Standard Certificate Of Death Field 41]. Indicates whether the injury or poisoning occurred at work. An injury may occur at work regardless of whether the injury occurred in the course of the decedent's usual occupation.
